title: Flash Pixel Fonts
content:
Hi   
  
I've been trying for days now to make a pixel font in Fontographer for use in Flash and I'm having problems, could anyone offer any advise or point me in the direction of a tutorial   
  
  
s.
author: coop

comments.content: Simon, [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826143324/http:/www.ultrashock.com/ff.htm?http://www.ultrashock.com/tutorials/flash5/fonttutorial.html) should help you get started.
